name: Mighty Mekong Bike Tour
description: The flatlands of the Mekong Delta are perfect for a cycling adventure! You share quiet back roads with the locals whose preferred means of travel is by bike. This tour also combines boat trips on the Mekong River to explore bustling floating markets and an over night stay in a guesthouse on Binh Hoa Phuoc Island.Highlight: Ho Chi Minh – Vinh Long – Can Tho – Thot Not – Chau Doc – Mekong Detail – Biking
